A mobile app that uses AI to analyze your snoring patterns and provides personalized recommendations for reducing or eliminating snoring.
A smartwatch that tracks your sleep and snoring patterns and alerts you if you're snoring too loudly or for too long.
A smart bed that adjusts the firmness and temperature to reduce snoring by supporting the head and neck and keeping the body cool.
A wearable device that uses ultrasound technology to stimulate the muscles in the throat and reduce snoring.
A smart mirror that uses facial recognition and machine learning to analyze your snoring patterns and provide personalized recommendations for reducing or eliminating snoring.
